title: Verkle Implementers Call #11
body:
[Get added to the calendar event here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1yTN_Gf4oPGg6z4xenaYK2QCSyP2keLrhfqyeZXs851k)

### Meeting Info

- [January 29, 2023, 14:00 UTC](https://savvytime.com/converter/utc-to-germany-berlin-united-kingdom-london-ny-new-york-city-ca-san-francisco-china-shanghai-japan-tokyo-australia-sydney/jan-29-2024/2-00pm)
- Duration: 60 minutes
- Meet link: https://meet.google.com/odf-tghm-ttu
- Recording: tbd

### Agenda
1. Client team updates
2. Testnet relaunch
3. Gas accounting / schedule changes
   - updates to the spec (e.g. so that the witness costs for the origin and target accounts headers are not charged)
   - [EIP-4762](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4762)
   - [EIP update PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8138)
4. Account header question
   - first 64 slots in the account header, but that means the first 64 slots of the next header are always zero
5. The transition 
   - Simplified transition proposal ([draft EIP](https://notes.ethereum.org/@gballet/rJz2oxB5a))
   - Erigon/Reth/general feedback
6. [EIP-2935](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2935): Save historical block hashes in state
   - implemented by Guillaume and Tanishq 
   - https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-2935-save-historical-block-hashes-in-state/4565/25
